bill_title: revise certain notice requirements for reporting motor vehicle accidents.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain notice requirements for reporting motor vehicle accidents. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-34-7 be amended to read as follows: 32-34-7. The driver of any motor vehicle involved in an accident resulting in bodily injuries or death to any person or property damage to an apparent extent of one two thousand dollars or more to any one person's property or two four thousand dollars per accident shall immediately, by the quickest means of communication, give notice of the accident to the nearest available law enforcement officer who has jurisdiction. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
